data.eml:eml: Brockphasma spinifemoralis gen. et spec. nov.: a new phasmid genus and new species of Neohiraseini (Phasmida: Necrosciinae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, George Wai-Chun, Liu, Xing-Yue, Bresseel, Joachim, Constant, Jerome (2014): Brockphasma spinifemoralis gen. et spec. nov.: a new phasmid genus and new species of Neohiraseini (Phasmida: Necrosciinae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3826 (1): 282-290, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3826.1.9
